attributes.title: Unsatisfied
attributes.review: I was under the impression that this app would give me the superhuman power to hurl my foreign neighbors from a fifth story window. Having downloaded the app, it had come to my attention that my strength is unchanged. I have also suddenly lost the respect of my friends and family. While this may be because of my decisions and not the app, I am disappointed that Mr. Trump has not personally slashed through my problems with a machete. Of course, Iâ€™m keeping the app, as Iâ€™m waiting for the president to show up with a boom box outside my window, but know that you could have done better. (Donâ€™t tell Donny Iâ€™m playing hard to get. I want him to work for so that the moment our lips meet will be all the more sweet.)

attributes.title: this ainâ€™t it
attributes.review: so, i heard about this app from TikTok. Of course, being the person that I am, I decided it would be an AMAZING decision to download the app to support our orange president. However, the is app was an absolute FAILURE. (Iâ€™m not surprised as Trump lacks basic common knowledge required for pretty much everything) When I downloaded the app, I was met with a big fat picture of a man with orange skin and wrinkles. Suddenly, he came out of the screen and chased me down around the house! Out of nowhere, troompa loompas tried to break my windows but luckily I knew how to fight them off. They all ended up with broken noses. Anyways, in conclusion our president is racist, a white supremacist and a horrible president overall. BLACK LIVES MATTER. #BreonnaTaylor #ICANTBREATHE #GeorgeFloyd

attributes.title: absolutely NASTY ðŸ¤®
attributes.review: I opened the app and the next day i heard a knock on my door. it was trump, but there was something off. i think maybe he got a spray tan that went awry or maybe it was just an impersonator. whoever it was, this trump character came into my house to personally thank me for downloading his app. my mom came out to see what was going on and immediately became nauseated and started spewing bile all over the place. my sister came out to see what was going on and the SAME THING happened. all this vomit triggered my dog who pooped while staring at trump, ate it, then regurgitated it at trumpâ€™s feet. my cat started meowing the most horrible meow and retching in the corner. i now have a migraine and a home covered ceiling to floor in fecal matter and vomit. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!

He hoping that if he acts like the coronavirus is not a big deal that his supporters will come to the polls and his non-supporters will not which will make him more likely to win. Therefore,  rigging the polls! Also heâ€™s not doing one single thing about Black Lives Matter and is sending police to attack peaceful protesters which is terribly wrong! Heâ€™s a violating the Constitution.
